name: Hot Springs National Park
description: Hot Springs National Park has a rich cultural past. The grand architecture of our historic bathhouses is equally matched by the natural curiosities that have been drawing people here for hundreds of years. Ancient thermal springs, mountain views, incredible geology, forested hikes, and abundant creeks – all in the middle of town – make Hot Springs National Park a unique and beautiful destination.
shortDescription: Hot Springs National Park has a rich cultural past. The grand architecture of our historic bathhouses is equally matched by the natural curiosities that have been drawing people here for hundreds of y...

operatingHours.description:
Arlington Lawn, Grand Promenade, sidewalks on Bathhouse Row, Reserve Street, and Fountain Street, except for walk through traffic, are open from to 5:00 am to 10:00 pm, daily. 

Roads to Hot Springs Mountain, North Mountain and West Mountain Summit are open to vehicle traffic from 8:00 am to 10:00 pm.

climate.weatherDescription: Average temperatures in Hot Springs can range from about 90°F (32°C) to less than 27°F (-2.7°C). Summer days can be hot and humid, with heat index values up to 110ºF (43ºC). Winter wind chills can make temperatures feel much colder, as low as 15ºF (-9.4ºC). Spring and fall typically have the most rainfall. Generally, Hot Springs experiences mild weather throughout the year.

images.title: Take A Hike!
images.altText: Close up of a hiking boot on the trail a hiker in the distance
images.caption: Hot Springs National Park has 26 miles of hiking trails to explore.

images.title: Hiker at bridge Whittington Park Creek
images.altText: Hiker sits at the edge of the creek, with a bridge in the background
images.caption: Visitors hike and enjoy the cool shady places in the park.

images.title: Bridge with fall colors
images.altText: Stone bridge surrounded by brilliant yellow and green leaves
images.caption: The park is beautiful year round
images.credit: NPS photo Mark David Artist In Residence 2015

images.title: Thermal Water Trough
images.altText: A stone tough in a green forest with water flowing down
images.caption: Along the hiking trails of Hot Springs Mountain are active troughs for directing the thermal water

images.title: Visitor at the edge of the pools of the hot water cascade
images.altText: women sitting on the stone wall at the hot water cascade as the vapor rises
images.caption: The natural curiosity of the thermal water can be seen and experienced

images.title: Balanced Rock Overlook
images.caption: Along Sunset Trail is the spectacular view over Balanced Rock
